title: WE LOVE OUR PETS!! Great Community for Animal-Lovers!
posting_body: ['Shadow Lake', '3515 Pleasantdale Rd.', 'Doraville, GA 30340', 'show contact info', 'Unit Information:', '2 Bedroom | 1 Bath', 'Unit Size:', '1100 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1495', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Unit Includes:', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Breakfast Bar', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Disposal', '➢ Patio/Balcony', '➢ Refrigerator/Ice Maker', '➢ Sunroom', '➢ Walk-In Closets', '➢ Cable/Satellite Available', '➢ Extended living room area', '➢ Fireplace in Select Units', '➢ Fully Equipped Kitchens', '➢ Hardwood Floors', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢', 'In Unit Washer & Dryer', '➢ Upgrade Unit', '➢ Vaulted Ceilings in Select Units', '➢ Views', 'Property Description:', 'Shadow Lake Apartments offers many amenities to our residents.', 'Take a swim in our lakeside pool, or enjoy grilling out in one of the courtyards while picnicking under a gazebo.', 'Tennis courts and a fitness center is also available, and feel free to update your social media status in our business center.', 'Property Amenities:', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Cable/Satellite Available', '➢ Central Air', '➢ Clubhouse', '➢ Dogs & Cats Welcome', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Picnic Area with Grill', '➢ Smoke Free', '➢ Sparkling Swimming Pool', '➢ Tennis Courts', '➢ Clothes Care Center', '➢ Lake on Site', '➢ Laundry Facilities', '➢ MARTA Access', '➢ Pet Care', '➢ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '➢ Scenic Lake', '➢ Se Habla Espanol', '➢ Walking Distance to Pleasantdale Park', '➢ Wooded Views', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Call us today!', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Pet Ownership Policy:', 'We accept 2 pets with a max weight of 50lbs.', 'and a pet fee of $300 and a monthly pet rent of $15.', 'Proudly managed by Ventron Management', 'Admin Fee: $135', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'AA82EC995909455']
